post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
Thanks for accepting my challenge. Now my next goal is very clear and my journey becomes interesting. I can swim 500 m in 25 minutes. I still have long way to go in order to compete with Spencer.
Now I am going to hire my personal swimming trainer, Lee Jun-Ho.
I will see Spencer at the pool in a month time.
Good Luck to me and Spencer
ps: I will buy the lunch before and after race because you give the chance for me to improve and will make my life that much fun for a month.
post.title: RE: 도전을 받아들이며
